response_parsed.summary: This explainer demonstrates how to containerize batch jobs using FastAPI, a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+. It utilizes Uvicorn as an ASGI server and Docker for containerization.
key_points: FastAPI is used to create the API that will manage the batch jobs.
Uvicorn, an ASGI server, is utilized to run FastAPI applications within a container.
Docker is leveraged to create and deploy the containerized application.
The Dockerfile contains instructions for building and running the container.
